featured.text: I tried one when I was a prep cook for Next Level Burgers…tasted awful, just like mashed peas gone to rot.

definition.zh_def: 將食物（通常是馬鈴薯）壓碎或搗爛的狀態。
definition.en_def: Crushed or ground into a soft, smooth consistency, often referring to food like potatoes.
definition.example: She served mashed potatoes with gravy for dinner.
